channel.title: julia on CS Research
channel.description: Recent content in julia on CS Research

item.title: Julia Syntax
item.description: This isn’t a traditional Julia tutorial. We’re taking a unique approach, using Julia as a launchpad to explore the fundamentals of software engineering, not to turn you into a Julia master. We will teach you just enough syntax to understand our examples. Reasons & Motivation Courses using Julia are taught in modern universities for various subjects, particularly in computer science and data science. We also teach Julia on our main website in details.
